Pre-Boss.requires: ({ItemValue(offense:3)} or ({ItemValue(offense_green:1)} and |Green Gem Deer|) or ({ItemValue(offense_orange:1)} and |Orange Gem Deer|) or ({ItemValue(offense_blue:1)} and |Blue Gem Deer|)) and |@Side Deck|
